text: Zabaykalsky Krai () is a federal subject (a krai) of Russia. The administrative center is the city of Chita. In 2010, 1,107,107 people lived there. The krai was created on 1 March 2008 from the merger of Chita Oblast and Agin-Buryat Autonomous Okrug. == References == Category:2008 establishments in Asia Category:2000s establishments in Russia
title: Zabaykalsky Krai
